name: Such a Hunter
description:
"Such a Hunter" Hi

 "Such a Hunter" is my first game created using the "P5.js" JavaScript library and is a 2D game with 3D graphics. The subject of this game is hunting migratory geese in my country, Iran. Many species of geese that migrate to Iran are declining for various reasons, and as a result, hunting more of their species has been banned. Also, due to the breeding of domestic geese on farms, hunting of migratory geese is not necessary. Therefore, more of the life and migration of these beautiful birds can be seen in protected areas. "Such a Hunter" is actually a fun game with the feeling of goose hunting in the virtual world, without harming the real migratory geese.

I hope you enjoy this game.

*If you see a bug in the game, write in the comments below. p5.js is a JavaScript library, not a game development tool. The game is definitely buggy and I apologize to you for that and try to fix it.*
